description: Try our easy to follow Ricotta, Plum & Almond Cake recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Ricotta, Plum & Almond Cake Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the tin and lining paper and transfer the cake to a serving plate. Dust the top with the icing sugar and serve, cut into wedges, with the sauce.
